name: Stop The Train - VR
description:
This is my first attempt at creating a VR game in unity I set the game on a runaway train that the player is tasked with stopping the player will slowly make there way through the carriages while solving puzzles and finding key cards 

For Further Information or if you wish to contact me visit my website and details in my process the  models in blender and see my other projects :
